message: Bob, I'm offering you my product at a price of $1000000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial transaction.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product, which I believe is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900000 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $950000. This is a significant concession on my part, and I believe it's a price that still allows for a mutually beneficial agreement. Let's work together to close this deal.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $930000. This is the best I can do at this time.
